law.catch_line: Subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection, the county board shall meet:...

section.section:
Subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection, the county board shall meet:
At least once each month during the months of July and August; and
At least twice each month during the months of September through June.
The county board shall meet at least 24 times each year.

text.section: Except for those actions authorized by subsection (c) of this section, all actions of the county board shall be taken at a public meeting and a record of the meeting and all actions shall be made public.
The county board may take actions in closed session in accordance with § 10-508 of the State Government Article, including action to close a meeting.
